name: 陳祝嵩
objective: 1. 圖形識別 (pattern recognition) 簡介  2.分類 (classification) 方法  3. 分群 (clustering) 方法  4. 迴歸 (regression) 方法  5. 混合高斯分佈 (mixture of Gaussian)  6.降維  (dimension reduction)方法  7. 圖形模式 (graphic model)
schedule:
進度預定如下 （可能隨教學狀況調整）：
1. Overview of pattern recognition
2. Nearest neighbor, k-nearest-neighbor and K-d Tree
3. Decision trees
4. K-means clustering and aggregated clustering
5. Polynomial regression; Radial Basis Function Network
6. MT 1
7. Multivariate Gaussian and Mixture of Gaussian
8. Fuzzy c-means
9. Back propagation and convolutional Neural Network
10. Principle component analysis 
11. Linear discriminating analysis
12. AdaBoost and cascaded boosting
13. Support vector machine
14. MT 2
15. Hidden Markov model
16. Bayesian Network
17. Markov Random Field
18. FT
scorePolicy:
Homework：20％
Midterm 1: 25%
Midterm 2: 25%
Term project or Final term: 30%
materials:
Textbooks:
1. Pattern Classification, Second Edition, by R. Duda, P. E. Hart, and D. G. Stork, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2001.
2. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning, by C. M. Bishop, Springer, 2006
